title: DVC to invest Rs 20,000 cr in solar energy projects by 2030
description: The Kolkata-headquartered corporation now has only 14 MW installed solar capacity and is executing a 348 MW project in association with NTPC. A 250MW/hour capacity of battery storage is also under consideration, he said.
